item.title: How to make an command *for the noobs*
item.dc:creator: @1k04lif3 1k04lif3
item.description:
@1k04lif3 wrote:

  1. You have to open your client.java

  2. Then type or copy this if (command.startsWith(" ") && playerRights >= 0)

Hint hint where do u see the (" type in the command name")

  1. If your doing a tele you do this teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####;

Hint type in the coords

4.sendMessage(“You are learning how to make commands hehe.”); to type a message

  1. If your going to add a item addItem(item number, ammount);

it should look something like this
if your doing a if (command.startsWith(" ") && playerRights >= 0)
teleportToX = ####;
teleportToY = ####;
sendMessage(“You are learning how to make commands hehe.”)

for a add item command

if (command.startsWith(" ") && playerRights >= 0)
addItem(item number, ammount);
sendMessage(“You are learning how to make commands hehe.”)

so thats my basic topic for my commands for noobs cya

-~1k04lif3~-

-~1k04lif3~-

Read full topic
